snippet.title: NintendoSwitch™ Tobari Dream Ocean  Nightmare
snippet.description:
2023/11/16 Available at NintendoeShop
http://en.playdouj.in/product/tobaridreamocean/

"This is a nightmare."


Dive into a nightmarish addition with ' Tobari  Dream Ocean' – 
now featuring nightmarish versions of all stages!

After purchase, you'll have the option to switch to the 
Nightmare version from the title screen.
The story remains fundamentally unchanged from the main storyline.

Nightmare! This is a game that CANNOT be recommended to any normal gamer. 
For those who have conquered all of Tobari Dream Ocean's main stages
 and crave even greater challenges, this content is tailored for the true daredevils!

Features
・Classic platformer action from desunoya with tricks and traps to challenge all comers!
・Over 30 types of magic at your disposal
・Over 48 stages and 6 worlds to explore

If you are a daredevil hero looking for a challenge, then this nightmare awaits you…
*This is an additional content for "Tobari Dream Ocean". To play, you need Tobari Dream Ocean.
